mapper.insert: insert into requests(post_id, member_id, position, status) values(#{postId}, #{memberId}, #{position}, #{status})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.post_id, r.position, r.status , p.title, p.game_date from requests r join posts p on p.id = r.post_id where r.member_id = #{memberId} order by r.id limit #{startPostNum}, #{perPage};
select count(*) from requests where member_id = #{memberId}
